#summary How to check out using svn


`svn checkout https://geobeagle.googlecode.com/svn/`

Eclipse / New Android Project / Create Project From Existing Source / select !GeoBeagle dir

!GeoBeagle / Properties / Java Build Path / Add External Jars.... / android.jar


Eclipse / Preferences / Set Android SDK Location

Set java1.6

Eclipse / New Java Project / Create Project From Existing Source / select !GeoBeagleTest dir
